Posts.Content: Feb 28, 2012 01:14AM wickednice wrote: I too had little pain after my double mascetomy and Ifeel the same way about my scar. I have big lumbs under each arm pit and a bump in the middle of my chest. the nurse thinks that they will go down with excerise but they really are uncomfortable and they look aweful. I don't mind being flat chested but I don't want to carry boobs under my arms. I see my surgeon Fri to see what can be done with them.
Posts.Title: Pain from Mastectomy and Scarring SusanB12 wickednice
